WorkItem.Description:
Grips of the Secret Grove is a ilvl 226 cloth hands item available from Magister Sarien (the Conquest emblem vendor in Dalaran) for 28 emblems.
Same stats in all respects as Touch of the Occult, except that Grips of the Secret Grove has +49 critical strike rating in place of the +49 haste rating on Touch of the Occult.
I was not able to find these gloves in the list of available items for my mage while trying to decide which to purchase.
Â 
Thanks!
Novastar, 80 Mage on Silvermoon
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Grips of the Secret Grove - missing from available cloth hands list

Comments.Message: Not a bug. See the readme.
Sorry about that.  I should have just RTFM.  Thanks, and thanks for this project in general.  I'd be lost without it in trying to acquire new gear.
